member.name: M:LifeInsuranceApi.Controllers.LifeInsuranceController.Get(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.String)
member.summary: Get the life insurance quote based on the date of birth and sex.
member.param: The date of birth in the format yyyy-MM-dd.
The sex of the individual, either 'male' or 'female'.
member.returns: A life insurance quote based on the provided information.
member.response: Bad Request, missing or invalid parameters.
Forbidden, invalid or missing API token.
Internal Server Error if an unexpected error occurs.
